text: melum, allah unakkuk kotutta (celvat)tiliru; natu marumai vittaittetik kol; eninum, ivvulakattil un nasipai (unakku vitittiruppataiyum) marantu vitate! Allah unakku nallataic ceytiruppataip pol, niyum nallatai cey! Innum, pumiyil kulappam ceyya virumpate niccayamaka allah kulappam ceypavarkalai necippatillai" (enrum kurinarkal)
